tweet_text: @SpaceMufasa @TriCitiesHoller @BalladHealth @alevine014 @modrnhealthcr As someone who does this type of work for Ballad, this post pisses me off. To suggest that me or my colleagues would do that is an outrageous accusation.

tweet_text:
🐈‍⬛ Cat 🐈‍⬛ 
If you feel drawn to the cat it can indicate that you are going to cross paths with something or someone mysterious, it’s also a reminder to embrace your independence or maybe even the opposite and ask others for assistance.

There’s unpredictable change in the air. https://t.co/zglGxCpbWf
